abstract: Residents of Maiduguri, Nigeria, appear to resume their normal lives one day after Nigerian army just barely fends off ambitious attack by Boko Haram to take the city; seeming ease with which city returns to normal routine is both source of pride and testament to its endurance in weathering many assaults over course of six years.
lead_paragraph: In some ways, it seemed as though the city of Maiduguri had returned to normal just 24 hours after a fierce Boko Haram attack.
snippet: In some ways, it seemed as though the city of Maiduguri had returned to normal just 24 hours after a fierce Boko Haram attack.

headline.main: A Nigerian City, Long Under Siege, Survives an Audacious Militant Assault
headline.print_headline: A Nigerian City, Long Under Siege, Survives an Audacious Militant Assault
